description:
The date & time that an event or subEvent starts, as an ISO-8601 date. For example `2021-05-17T22:00:00+00:00`.

- `event`: The very first date & time that the event starts
- `subEvent`: The start date & time of this specific occurence of the event

Always required on subEvents.

Required on events when using one of the following calendarTypes:

- `single`
- `multiple`
- `periodic`
title: startDate
